channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Big herbs over the Place, 9th September
item.description:
More than 4 months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kinglake Street, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Woodland trees dying and in danger of falling on private property, 9th September
item.description:
Hi, these trees are in the woodlands right next to Roundwood, Chislehurst BR7 5RQ and as you can see from the pictures one very large Ash tree has fell on its own, one similar very large Ash tree is in danger of falling (and given proximity could be on our property and we are terrified as we also have small children living in the property as well) and another smaller dead tree. There are other trees next to these ones that I have submitted pictures for that are also either dangerous or have large branches falling down on paths in the woodlands. To me it looks like they have not been inspected or maintained in a very long time and are either sick or dangerously overgrown so would request an urgent check and confirmation please. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Roundwood, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter spillage, 9th September
item.description:
I reported this over a week ago still there, 2 large rubbish bins with added rubbish which the council left there about 3 weeks ago in Tellson Avenue on the pavement have to dodge it when walking past, white bags left in road and pavements in Telleson Avenue and water bottles being dumped and loads of black bags and rubbish on the green opposite Aberford Gardens and Tellson Avenue where the work huts are. Also there is a mattress in Telleson Avenue which has been dumped and again loads of rubbish in the garages at the end of Aberford Gardens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 346, Shooters Hill Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Awful Graffiti, 9th September
item.description:
Please can you clear the graffiti all across the ampersand wall (yet again). Would it be possible to not lose anymore of the original blue artwork. It’s such a shame that this wall keeps being picked on. Thank you for what you can do.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Milestone Road, Crystal Palace, London

item.title: Ice cream van idling engine for hours, 9th September
item.description:
This ice cream van keeps parking outside our flats (opposite the school) from school pick up times for hours. It’s been nearly 3hours today and similar on other days. Noise and fumes unbearable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tandy Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Traffic light timing, 9th September
item.description:
The right-turn signal from the A127 into Ardleigh Green stays green for only a few seconds, letting just 2–3 cars through before going red again. This causes long queues and unnecessary congestion. Please review and adjust the signal timing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ardleigh Green Road, Ardleigh Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter/food/bins, 9th September
item.description:
Bins have been here for over 3 weeks. Rubbish and litter dumped around them including food. Rats seen again. Asda trolleys also dumped here constantly. Can more be done to keep this area free of fly tipping and rubbish. Weeds also overgrown

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edwards Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked road drain, 9th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, London

item.title: Rubbish everywhere in children’s park, 9th September
item.description:
